name: Darkest Diabolos, Lord of the Lair
text:
Your opponent cannot Tribute this face-up card on the field, also they cannot target it with card effects. You can only use each of these effects of "Darkest Diabolos, Lord of the Lair" once per turn.
● If a DARK monster(s) you control is Tributed (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from the GY (if it was there when you Tributed) or hand (even if not).
● You can Tribute 1 DARK monster; your opponent places 1 card from their hand on either the top or bottom of their Deck.
